string.text: A backpack made of durable material able to withstand the most harsh weather conditions.
A portable sleeping bag designed to keep the user warm and hidden at night.
A durable backpack with various pouches and compartments equipped with quick release clips; giving the ability to drop the field kit at a moment's notice.
A toolkit containing oils and tools used for basic firearm maintenance. Very useful when out exploring, but also quite heavy.
A toolkit containing oils and tools used for advanced firearm maintenance. Very useful when out exploring, but also quite heavy.
